column1: Kata Robata////The food here is good. It's nothing amazing but the restaurant is cute and trendy. My friend loves this restaurant and insisted on eating here for her birthday
column2: over other fancier restaurants. I called numerous times the day before and left messages to reserve a table for her birthday. I arrived before my friend and made sure to tell them it was her birthday and to add a candle on the dessert. I made sure to tell the hostess it was a big birthday. They assured me a candle would be added. It did not happen. They did not put a candle on her dessert and the waitress did not wish my friend a happy birthday. I am very disappointed after my numerous request
column3: they failed to make my friend's birthday special. I would not suggest this place for any special occasions. I am not a returning customer after today.
